spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is highly consistent. Small deviations in window counts in the dining area and secondary entrance location. Stair proportions are slightly widened compared to plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls are correctly aligned and room adjacencies are respected. The closet doors in the foyer (bi-fold) and bedroom show good detail, though the pantry enclosure is slightly simplified.

furniture_mapping.notes: Excellent mapping of kitchen islands, appliances, and living room set. Scale is consistent with the architectural space.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality isometric rendering. Orthographic projection is clean with professional lighting and legible geometry.

detected_errors.description: Dining area side windows are merged into a single frame instead of discrete units as per plan.
The door leading to the Playroom from the kitchen is swing-reversed or misplaced relative to the pantry alcove.
Staircase run appears deeper in the 3D model than the numerical count of treads indicated on the original 2D plan.
